argument.name: CSSFilename
argument.description: The source file that contains the CSS.

argument.name: flagForceLoad
argument.description: True = forces a load event even if the file is already loaded.

section.description: If the flagForeLoad argument is true then the CSS file is loaded even if it has been previously loaded. The default value for flagForceLoad is false.

section.title: Example
section.description: mycss.css is loaded from the same folder in the webroot as the current component
